title: Ep 091: Wine Holiday Gifts and Gift Etiquette
description: Are you at a loss for what to get a wine lover for the holidays? Have some etiquette questions on sharing your good stuff for Festivus? Look no further, we've got fun ideas for these holidays or any gift giving occasions!
